events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item is not what I expected and I want to request a refund because it doesn't match the description on your website.
The customer's request involves a refund related to product dissatisfaction; categorizing the case as a refund issue for further processing.
Assigning this refund case to agent Sarah J. for handling and resolution due to her expertise with payment related cases.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer service. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent order and I’m here to help you through the process.
Could you please provide the order number and specify the reason why you want the refund so I can process your request as quickly as possible?
The order number is 987654321, and the product is not as described; the color and size are completely different from the website images.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process and you should receive the money back within 5 to 7 business days. Please let us know if you want a replacement instead.
I appreciate your prompt response and the refund initiation. I would prefer to receive a refund rather than a replacement, thank you.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. You will receive a confirmation email shortly and the refund should appear on your payment method soon.
We’re following up to confirm that you have received your refund. Please contact us if there are any further issues or questions.
Since you have confirmed satisfaction with the refund, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting our support team.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey regarding your experience with our refund process. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
